    • Method Detail

      • normalizeSummonerName

        public static java.lang.String normalizeSummonerName(java.lang.String summonerName)
        Normalizes and returns a summoner name. Specifically, this casts String summonerName to lower case and strips any whitespaces.
        Parameters:
        summonerName - summoner name
        Returns:
        Normalized summoner name
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If summonerName is null

      • normalizeSummonerNames

        public static java.lang.String[] normalizeSummonerNames(java.lang.String... summonerNames)
        Normalizes and returns an array of summoner names. Specifically, this casts each of String[] summonerNames to lower case and strips any whitespaces.
        Parameters:
        summonerNames - summoner names
        Returns:
        Normalized summoner names
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If summonerNames is null

      • normalizeSummonerNames

        public static <T> java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> normalizeSummonerNames(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,T> summonerNames)
        Normalizes and returns a map with summoner name keys. This casts each of the keys of Map<String, T> map to lower case and strips any whitespaces.
        Parameters:
        summonerNames - map with summoner name keys
        Returns:
        Normalized map with summoner name keys
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If summonerNames is null

      • joinString

        public static java.lang.String joinString(java.lang.CharSequence delimiter,
                                          java.lang.Object... elements)
        Returns a new String composed of copies of the elements joined together with a copy of the specified delimiter. Note that if an element is null, then "null" is added.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - the delimiter that separates each element
        elements - the elements to join together
        Returns:
        a new String that is composed of the elements separated by the delimiter
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If delimiter or elements is null

      • joinString

        public static java.lang.String joinString(java.lang.CharSequence delimiter,
                                          java.lang.CharSequence... elements)
        Returns a new String composed of copies of the elements joined together with a copy of the specified delimiter. Note that if an element is null, then "null" is added.
        Parameters:
        delimiter - the delimiter that separates each element
        elements - the elements to join together
        Returns:
        a new String that is composed of the elements separated by the delimiter
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - If delimiter or elements is null

      • requireValidSummonerName

        public static java.lang.String requireValidSummonerName(java.lang.String summonerName)
                                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks that the specified String is not an invalid summoner name. This method is designed primarily to be called by the RiotApi to check the validity of a summoner name before firing a request to the Riot Api.
        Parameters:
        summonerName - The summoner name to to check for validity
        Returns:
        summonerName if not invalid
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If summonerName is not valid
